18155095.count: Congo, Democratic Republic of,CONGO, DEMOCRATIC REPUBLIC OF

repnme.cdata!:
Zaire - Economic Management and
            Institutional Development Project

abstracts.cdata!:
The Economic Management and
            Institutional Development Project is designed to help
            Government implement the structural adjustment credit
            measures in the short term, and at the same time, initiate
            long-term efforts to build up its capability in planning and
            financial management.  It also supports improvement of
            Government's capacity to monitor public enterprise (PE)
            management and to launch a pilot effort to improve civil
            service employment conditions, consistent with the civil
            service reform objectives and structure agreed upon under
            the SAL credits.  Financing is to be provided for services
            of national and international consultants, training
            activities, equipment and vehicles, studies and impact
            analyses, and incremental operating costs to strengthen the
            core economic ministries focusing on several critical areas.
            These areas include investment programming and budgeting,
            budgeting and financial management, and public enterprise management.
